CustomField.description: Tracks the number of months between the estimated start and end dates
CustomField.formula: MOD( IF( /** Baseline Mths - Same Yr */ YEAR(Estimated_End_Date__c) = YEAR(Estimated_Start_Date__c), IF( DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) =1, MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c) - MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c), MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c) - MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c)-1 ),0 ) + IF( /** Correct Baseline Mths for same Yr, Same Mth, Start Day != 1, +1 month to avoid -1 result */ AND( YEAR(Estimated_End_Date__c) = YEAR(Estimated_Start_Date__c), MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c) = MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c), DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) != 1 ), 1, 0) + IF( /**Baseline Mths - Diff Yrs & Start = 1st */ AND( YEAR(Estimated_End_Date__c) > YEAR(Estimated_Start_Date__c), DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) =1 ), 12-MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c) + MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c), 0) + IF( /** Baseline Mths - Diff Yrs & Start != 1st */ AND( YEAR(Estimated_End_Date__c) > YEAR(Estimated_Start_Date__c), DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) != 1 ), IF( /** Part of above */ AND( MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c) = MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c), DAY(Estimated_End_Date__c) >= DAY (Estimated_Start_Date__c-1) ), 0, 12-MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c) + MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c)-1 ), 0) + IF( /** Start is the 1st and End is last Mth day +1 Mth */ AND( DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) = 1, DAY(Estimated_End_Date__c + 1) < DAY(Estimated_End_Date__c) ), 1, 0) + IF( /** Diff Mths & Start != 1st & Start Day >= (End Day -1), +1 Mth */ AND( MONTH(Estimated_Start_Date__c) != MONTH(Estimated_End_Date__c), DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c) != 1, DAY(Estimated_End_Date__c) >= DAY(Estimated_Start_Date__c-1) ), 1, 0) ,12)
CustomField.label: Contract Term (Months)
